welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kanakir, Syria! Get ready to experience the charming blend of ancient history and modern culture that this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kanakir has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Masada Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Damascus International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Damascus International Airport handles all cargo operations, including freight and mail.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kiryat Shmona Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
